name: Aerial Ace
description:
Welcome to Aerial Ace!

This is an endless runner in which you'll have to achieve the highest score possible. The difficulty will increase as time progresses. Therefore, be careful, as you will not score points while slowing down.

You can see the controls menu in-game to learn how to play. Remember that you can play using a gamepad in all platforms if you prefer it (including Android and Web).

Finally,  I would appreciate your support by following me on Twitter (@pedrocasas_) and leaving a comment with your opinion.

Thanks for playing! :D
